person.note: Zheng(1) Yuanyou [27965] CHECK funerary inscription. WDY entry says that he moved from Suichang Xian to Qiantang Xian and then to Wu Xian. I am identifying move from Suichang to Qiantang with his father. WDY, 3, 1935.
